## ResourceTools.ResourceEditorResult type

Result of attempting to create a resource editor for a specific resource. Used by ResourceEditorFactory to provide type-specific editors.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ResourceEditorResult = {
    success: true;
    editor: React.ComponentType<IResourceEditorProps>;
} | {
    success: false;
    message?: string;
};
```
**References:** [IResourceEditorProps](./ts-res-ui-components.resourcetools.iresourceeditorprops.md)
